name: Hotel Domus

reviews.text: Excellent value for 20 EUR per night! Hotel is clean and tidy, reception personnel is friendly and for this price you even get toasts with some jam and butter for breakfast. Located in a quiet residential area, to a beach with abundance of restaurants it is less than 10 minutes walk. All the city centre attractions, shopping facilities and nightlife are easy reachable by bus, service #11 runs about every 10 minutes.
reviews.title: Great value for EUR 20!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is at 10 minutes walking from the beach but it doesn´t seem to be near the sea.
reviews.title: Normal hotel

aka: Hotel Domus Malaga, Spain - Costa Del Sol
description: The Hotel Domus is located in the quiet neighborhood of Pedregalejo, in Malaga, only 5 minutes walk from the beach of the same name. All rooms are elegant and have air conditioning / heating, flat screen TV and Wi-Fi. The rooms have a contemporary design with wooden floor, desk and private bathroom. The Hotel Domus has continental breakfast served every morning.
